statements: SELECT * FROM survey_data ORDER BY survey_id ASC;
SELECT survey_id, participant_name FROM survey_data WHERE participant_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM survey_data WHERE survey_id = 3;
SELECT participant_name, submission_date FROM survey_data WHERE submission_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT survey_id, survey_questions->>'question' AS question FROM survey_data;
SELECT * FROM survey_data ORDER BY survey_id DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT participant_name FROM survey_data WHERE survey_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM survey_data WHERE survey_id IN (1, 2, 3) AND submission_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT survey_id, submission_date FROM survey_data WHERE participant_name LIKE 'John%' ORDER BY survey_id ASC;
SELECT AVG(CAST(jsonb_array_elements_text(survey_questions->'ratings') AS INT)) AS avg_rating FROM survey_data;
SELECT * FROM survey_data;
SELECT survey_question, survey_answer FROM survey_data WHERE survey_id = 1;
SELECT survey_question, survey_answer FROM survey_data WHERE participant_id = 5;
SELECT participant_name, participant_email, participant_role FROM participant_data;
SELECT * FROM participant_data WHERE participant_role = 'Admin';
SELECT * FROM survey_data WHERE survey_id = 1;
SELECT survey_question, survey_answer FROM survey_data WHERE survey_id = 2;
SELECT participant_id, participant_email FROM participant_data WHERE participant_role = 'Admin';
SELECT survey_question, survey_answer FROM survey_data ORDER BY survey_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM participant_data WHERE participant_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM survey_data;
SELECT survey_name, survey_date FROM survey_data;
SELECT * FROM question_data ORDER BY question_id DESC;
SELECT respondent_name, respondent_email FROM survey_data WHERE survey_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT q.question_text, a.answer_text FROM question_data q JOIN answer_data a ON q.question_id = a.question_id;
SELECT * FROM survey_data;
SELECT survey_name, survey_date FROM survey_data WHERE survey_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT survey_name, respondent_name FROM survey_data ORDER BY survey_name DESC;
SELECT question_text, question_type FROM question_data WHERE question_type = 'Multiple Choice';
SELECT answer_text, respondent_id FROM answer_data WHERE respondent_id IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM surveys;
SELECT survey_name, survey_data FROM surveys;
SELECT id, survey_name, created_at FROM surveys;
SELECT * FROM respondents ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT respondent_name, respondent_email FROM respondents WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM surveys;
SELECT survey_name, created_at FROM surveys WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM respondents ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT question_text, question_type FROM questions WHERE id = 2;
SELECT survey_name, respondent_name, response_text FROM surveys s JOIN respondents r ON s.id = r.id JOIN responses rp ON s.id = rp.survey_id;
SELECT * FROM surveys;
SELECT id, name, email FROM surveys ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT response_id, survey_id, email FROM responses WHERE survey_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username, role FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT user_id, username, role FROM users WHERE role = 'user' ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT * FROM surveys WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM surveys ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT survey_data FROM surveys WHERE id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM responses JOIN surveys ON responses.survey_id = surveys.id;
SELECT question_text, question_type FROM survey_questions WHERE survey_id = 1;
